thread.title: Where Are They Now? These 23 Celebrities Said They'd Move If Trump Won
thread.title_full: Where Are They Now? These 23 Celebrities Said They'd Move If Trump Won

author: Christine Rousselle
title: Where Are They Now? These 23 Celebrities Said They'd Move If Trump Won
text:
Where Are They Now? These 23 Celebrities Said They'd Move If Trump Won Share Share Tweet 
Back in September, my colleague Catherine Dunn published this nice compilation of 23 celebrities who said they would be leaving the country if Donald Trump were elected president. Given that Trump was indeed elected president and will be inaugurated on Friday, I thought it would be prudent to check in and see if any of these celebrities had stayed true to their word. 
It's time to find out: have they decided that America is actually already pretty great? 
1. Jon Stewart 
Where was he headed? Another planet. 
Where is he now? Still on earth. 
2. Chelsea Handler 
Where was she headed? Spain. (Kudos for the originality, Chelsea.) 
Where is she now? Still in the U-S-of-A. Shortly after the election, Handler backed out of moving. She's currently filming season 2 of her show for Netflix. 
3. Neve Campbell 
Where was she headed? Canada. (She's a Canadian native and a Canadian citizen.) 
Where is she now? Still in the United States. On Thanksgiving, she posted a message on Instagram imploring people to try to see eye-to-eye despite the divisive times. A photo posted by Neve Campbell (@nevecampbell) on Nov 26, 2016 at 4:30pm PST 
4. Barry Diller 
Where was he headed? "Out of the country." 
Where is he now? Diller appears to still be in the United States. 
5. Lena Dunham 
Where was she headed? Vancouver. 
Where is she now? The United States, and posting a ton of rainbows on Instagram to cope with the upcoming inauguration. A photo posted by Lena Dunham (@lenadunham) on Jan 14, 2017 at 11:31am PST 
6. Keegan-Michael Key 
Where was he headed? Canada. 
Where is he now? Not Canada. Thank you @KeeganMKey and @DannyDeVito for joining us at the #RFKennedyGala last night! pic.twitter.com/UFNq4jtmti — Kerry Kennedy (@KerryKennedyRFK) December 7, 2016 
7. Chloë Sevigny 
Where was she headed? Nova Scotia. 
Where is she now? She appears to still be in the USA and has quite a few movies coming out in 2017. A photo posted by Chloe Sevigny (@chloessevigny) on Nov 8, 2016 at 6:03pm PST 
8. Al Sharpton 
Where was he headed? "Out of here." 
Where is he now? Given that he'll be appearing at a protest on Thursday, I'm going to say he's still living in the U.S. 
9. Natasha Lyonne 
Where was she headed? A mental hospital. 
Where is she now? ...not a mental hospital. (According to her Twitter, she's in the U.K.) In spirit only. I'm in U.K. Solidarity shout out to all the good people and @OITNB ladies who'll be there in the flesh! #WomensMarch ??? https://t.co/cabrmBLVrI — natasha lyonne (@nlyonne) January 13, 2017 
10. Eddie Griffin 
Where was he headed? Africa. 
Where is he now? Baltimore. — Eddie Griffin (@EddieGriffinCom) January 14, 2017 
11. Spike Lee 
Where was he headed? Brooklyn. 
Where is he now? Brooklyn! A photo posted by Spike Lee (@officialspikelee) on Jan 16, 2017 at 2:30am PST 
12. Amber Rose 
Where was she headed? "Out!" 
Where is she now? USA. A photo posted by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Jan 13, 2017 at 7:37pm PST 
13. Samuel L. Jackson 
Where was he headed? South Africa. 
Where is he now? Not entirely sure, but these tweets don't look like someone who is leaving any time soon. (language warning) The Last Time I survived Jim Crow I was Poor, guess what MOTHERFUCKERS.. Not This Time!! Enjoy your newfound win,Bigly!! — Samuel L. Jackson (@SamuelLJackson) November 11, 2016 Why y'all so anxious for me to leave?! I pay More Taxes than All U Trumpafukkaz... Him too!! — Samuel L. Jackson (@SamuelLJackson) November 14, 2016 
14. Cher 
Where was she headed? Jupiter. 
Where is she now? Not Jupiter. (She'll be partaking in the Women's March on Washington.) 
15. George Lopez 
Where was he headed? Mexico. 
Where is he now? He's got tour dates throughout the U.S. for most of 2017. 
16. Barbra Streisand 
Where was she headed? Australia or Canada. 
Where is she now? She does not appear to have moved to either Australia or Canada. A photo posted by Barbra Streisand (@barbrastreisand) on Jan 8, 2017 at 12:09pm PST 
17. Raven-Symoné 
Where was she headed? Canada, and she had already purchased tickets. 
Where is she now? She's still in the United States. 
18. Whoopi Goldberg 
Where was she headed? Somewhere that's not the United States. 
Where is she now? Goldberg is still in the U.S. and will be heading to Walt Disney World this March to film episodes of The View. Have you heard the news? We're headed to @WaltDisneyWorld ! pic.twitter.com/KPRa555toB — The View (@TheView) January 14, 2017 
19. Omari Hardwick 
Where was she headed? Italy. 
Where is she now? His Twitter bio says he's "currently in New York." 
20. Miley Cyrus 
Where was she headed? Anywhere, "leaving." 
Where is she now? California. To Cyrus' credit, she posted a picture on Instagram after Trump's victory saying that it was important to be "accepting" of his presidency to help unify the country. A photo posted by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Nov 9, 2016 at 8:19am PST 
21. Ruth Bader Ginsburg 
Where was she headed? New Zealand. 
Where is she now? Still on the bench of the United States Supreme Court. 
22. Amy Schumer 
Where was she headed? Spain. 
Where is she now? America. She now says that her threat to move to Spain was a joke . 
23. Katie Hopkins 
Where was she headed? The USA. (She's British.) 
Where is she now? Still in the U.K. 
In sum: It looks as though most people are just talk.
